PHP Manual

mongo_close

(PECL mongo >= 0.8.0)

mongo_close — Closes a connection to the database

Description

bool mongo_close ( resource $connection )

Close a connection to the database and frees the connection object.

Parameters

connection

The database connection to close.

Return Values

Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

See Also

  • mongo_connect() - Connects to a database
